content: slip 2 stitches your yarn was row 4 ws k1 sl2 wyib p1 to 1 st before end k1 already in front repeat pattern 12 times you should end up with a square that is roughly 4 inches by 4 inches if you like the feel of your swatch begin pattern if not start over with a larger or smaller needle size slip_stitch help to work a slip_stitch insert your right-hand needle tip into the next stitch as if to purl from the front then move that stitch from the left hand needle to the right hand needle without working it one stitch slipped stitches can be slipped with the working yarn held in the back or the front slip with yarn in front sl wyif move working yarn to front if not there already then slip the stitch as described above if the next stitch is a purl work the purl as usual if the next stitch is a knit move yarn to back and work the knit slip with yarn in back sl wyib move working yarn to back if not there already then slip the stitch as described above if the next stitch is a purl you ll need to move the yarn to the front before making the purl if the next stitch is a knit you can knit the stitch as usual gridster cowl © 2022 lynnell koser page 8
